mil6.3.12:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, atthi so padeso puratthimaya va disaya dakkhinaya va disaya pacchimaya va disaya uttaraya va disaya uddham va adho va tiriyam va, yattha nibbanam sannihitan”ti?
mil6.3.12:1.2: “Natthi, maharaja, so padeso puratthimaya va disaya dakkhinaya va disaya pacchimaya va disaya uttaraya va disaya uddham va adho va tiriyam va, yattha nibbanam sannihitan”ti.
mil6.3.12:2.1: “Yadi, bhante nagasena, natthi nibbanassa sannihitokaso, tena hi natthi nibbanam?
mil6.3.12:2.2: Yesanca tam nibbanam sacchikatam, tesampi sacchikiriya miccha, karanam tattha vakkhami.
mil6.3.12:2.3: Yatha, bhante nagasena, mahiya dhannutthanam khettam atthi, gandhutthanam puppham atthi, pupphutthanam gumbo atthi, phalutthanam rukkho atthi, ratanutthanam akaro atthi, tattha yo koci yam yam icchati, so tattha gantva tam tam harati;
mil6.3.12:2.4: evameva kho, bhante nagasena, yadi nibbanam atthi, tassa nibbanassa utthanokasopi icchitabbo, yasma ca kho, bhante nagasena, nibbanassa utthanokaso natthi, tasma natthi nibbananti brumi, yesanca nibbanam sacchikatam, tesampi sacchikiriya miccha”ti.
mil6.3.12:3.1: “Natthi, maharaja, nibbanassa sannihitokaso, atthi cetam nibbanam, sammapatipanno yoniso manasikarena nibbanam sacchikaroti.
mil6.3.12:3.2: Yatha pana, maharaja, atthi aggi nama, natthi tassa sannihitokaso, dve katthani sanghattento aggim adhigacchati;
mil6.3.12:3.3: evameva kho, maharaja, atthi nibbanam, natthi tassa sannihitokaso, sammapatipanno yoniso manasikarena nibbanam sacchikaroti.
mil6.3.12:4.1: Yatha va pana, maharaja, atthi satta ratanani nama.
mil6.3.12:4.3: cakkaratanam hatthiratanam assaratanam maniratanam itthiratanam gahapatiratanam parinayakaratanam.
mil6.3.12:4.4: Na ca tesam ratananam sannihitokaso atthi, khattiyassa pana sammapatipannassa patipattibalena tani ratanani upagacchanti.
mil6.3.12:4.5: Evameva kho, maharaja, atthi nibbanam, natthi tassa sannihitokaso, sammapatipanno yoniso manasikarena nibbanam sacchikaroti”ti.
mil6.3.12:5.1: “Bhante nagasena, nibbanassa sannihitokaso ma hotu, atthi pana tam thanam, yattha thito sammapatipanno nibbanam sacchikaroti”ti?
mil6.3.12:5.2: “Ama, maharaja, atthi tam thanam, yattha thito sammapatipanno nibbanam sacchikaroti”ti.
mil6.3.12:6.1: “Katamam pana, bhante, tam thanam, yattha thito sammapatipanno nibbanam sacchikaroti”ti?
mil6.3.12:6.2: “Silam, maharaja, thanam, sile patitthito yoniso manasikaronto sakkayavanepi cinavilatepi alasandepi nigumbepi kasikosalepi kasmirepi gandharepi nagamuddhanipi brahmalokepi yattha katthacipi thito sammapatipanno nibbanam sacchikaroti.
mil6.3.12:6.3: Yatha, maharaja, yo koci cakkhuma puriso sakayavanepi cinavilatepi alasandepi nigumbepi kasikosalepi kasmirepi gandharepi nagamuddhanipi brahmalokepi yattha katthacipi thito akasam passati;
mil6.3.12:6.4: evameva kho, maharaja, sile patitthito yoniso manasikaronto sakayavanepi …pe…
mil6.3.12:6.5: yattha katthacipi thito sammapatipanno nibbanam sacchikaroti.
mil6.3.12:7.3: evameva kho, maharaja, sile patitthitassa yoniso manasikarontassa sakkayavanepi …pe…
mil6.3.12:7.4: yattha katthacipi thitassa sammapatipannassa atthi nibbanasacchikiriya”ti.
mil6.3.12:7.5: “Sadhu, bhante nagasena, desitam taya nibbanam, desita nibbanasacchikiriya, parikkhata silaguna, dassita sammapatipatti, ussapito dhammaddhajo, santhapita dhammanetti, avanjho suppayuttanam sammapayogo, evametam ganivarapavara tatha sampaticchami”ti.
